Text: remastered? nice if any of the game sites even payed attention to these games. Gets ignored like Drakensang because there's no 1st person shooter multiplayer or cartoons involved.

Remastered: these versions of the games have been patched with the latest updates, they support higher, widescreen resolutions and they work on Windows 7/Vista. 

Don't expect better textures or improved character models, though.
Lol "Bonus content: a lot of stuff." Just because of that I don't care what the bonus is I'm downloading and seeding for a while xD Thanks Esharoth
